description: Synthesis queue — tracks specimens updated since last synthesis, for interactive synthesis review. Updated by Phase 2 curation (adds entries) and interactive synthesis sessions (marks synthesized). Not consumed by any automated script — synthesis is interactive only (see WORKFLOW.md).
